thread.title: 17 Low-Key Rich Mom Pieces for Winter Weather | Us Weekly
thread.title_full: 17 Low-Key Rich Mom Pieces for Winter Weather | Us Weekly

author: Suzy Forman
title: 17 Low-Key Rich Mom Pieces for Winter Weather | Us Weekly
text: Us Weekly has affiliate partnerships. We receive compensation when you click on a link and make a purchase. [Learn more!](https://www.usmagazine.com/commerce-guidelines/) Please note, prices are accurate at the date of publication, January 12, 2024, but are subject to change. Being a mom is the hardest job in the world. If you need a day (or a week) to dress solely in sweats or pajamas, we say to go for it. But if you need a pick-me-up and a renewed boost of confidence, a chic outfit can make it happen in a snap. Let’s keep things easy by shopping online so your new clothes and accessories are delivered right to you. We’re aiming for the “rich mom” aesthetic — but low-key. Well-tailored, versatile basics, little flashes of designer and functional fashion — we’re even throwing some sophisticated loungewear in there! Everything we’ve picked out is under $100 and is 100% ready for winter weather. Shop below! 1. Affordable and Adorable! Nail the quiet luxury vibe without breaking the bank with this [BTFBM half-zip sweater](https://amzn.to/3S2l09u) — was $56, now $34! 2. You’ve Got Flare! Come with Us as we find all of lululemon’s best hidden gems in the We Made Too Much section. First up? These [Align High-Rise Mini-Flared Pants](https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&awinaffid=567357&campaign=&clickref=UsWeekly-sforman-In-text-COMMERCE-SHOPLowKeyRichMomWinter-DATE1-15-24&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2Fp%2Fwomens-leggings%2FAlign-HR-Mini-Flare-32-MD%2F_%2Fprod11460456%3Fcolor%3D52868&platform=pl) — originally $118, now $79! 3. Now That’s a Twist! Flattering and fashionable, this [Raisecom ribbed sweater dress](https://amzn.to/3O4v5lb) definitely calls for a mirror selfie — $44! 4. Falling for Fleece! This cozy, drop-shoulder [turtleneck sweatshirt](https://howl.me/clqAdrf737R) from Banana Republic Factory has an easy fit and a compliment-worthy look — was $75, now $38! 5. Faux Fur, Faux Sure! We love a puffer, but if you’re looking to impress at a meetup, make sure this [Bellivera fleece-lined trench](https://amzn.to/3Sj6snf) is in your arsenal — $80! 6. Thanks, It Has Pockets! Moms need to carry the world with them at all times, making this “pocket-plentiful” [Dagne Dover tote](https://fave.co/48OMnKO) a stylish must-have — was $155, now $89! 7. Love Leggings! Don’t want to give up your leggings? No problem. Simply switch to this leather-look [Tagoo pair](https://amzn.to/3S0QJaZ) — originally $60, now $40! 8. Best Booties! Shoes can seriously make or break a look. You can rely on these [Dream Pairs heeled booties](https://amzn.to/3TUejc6) to elevate all of your outfits — $36! 9. Cashmere Queen! Finding cashmere on major sale is our favorite hobby. You need to see this [Charter Club longline belted cardigan](https://howl.me/clqAreuk47g) from Macy’s — was $229, now $92! 10. Versatile Loungewear! Need loungewear you can wear outside? This [Lillusory set](https://amzn.to/423axiK), which comes in 12 colors, was made to be seen — $50! 11. Heavenly Hat! Adding a beanie to your look doesn’t have to make it super casual. Try out this amazingly soft [Barefoot Dreams beanie](https://amzn.to/42fGPap) — $37! 12. Dreamy Dress! You cannot skip over Lolë’s Winter Sale. This [half-zip dress](https://fave.co/48OHGAA) is a full 60% off right now — was $155, now $62! 13. Silky Satin! These cargo-inspired [Allegra K satin joggers](https://amzn.to/3U3sCLo) will take your street style (or playground style!) to the next level — $36! 14. Stunning Scarf! You’ll actually find yourself hoping for colder weather so you can rock this [Melifluos faux-fur scarf](https://amzn.to/426JaEj) from Spain — $17! 15. Velvety Soft! We can’t get over the color options of this [Express velvet blazer](https://www.jdoqocy.com/click-8841803-11553913?sid=LowKeyRichMomWinter-1-15-24&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.express.com%2Fclothing%2Fwomen%2Fvelvet-one-button-blazer%2Fpro%2F06747125%2Fcolor%2FWine%2F). A truly standout piece — $56! 16. Sophisticated Sweatshirt: Need to keep it comfy and casual, but don’t want to look lazy? Swap your crew neck for this [Dokotoo button-collar sweatshirt](https://amzn.to/3Uj8NA7) — was $50, now $39! 17. Last but Not Least! Big fan of jumpsuits? Same. This [Amazon Essentials pick](https://amzn.to/4b0vWwP) has especially captured our hearts — was $33, now $30!
